name: Madelin Innovation
goal: To offer strategic consultancy services, for profit and not-for-profit, to offer executive and non-executive management services and to offer speaking, convening, moderating, coaching, writing and other value-adding services as appropriate.

euInitiatives: Policy areas: trade and investment, innovation, health and healthcare, technology and innovation, competition, food and drink, data, Internet, behavioural science.
